attributes.action: All Members of Parliament who vote for wars must fight on the front lines.
attributes.additional_details:
Blair - Weapons of Mass Destruction = Countless British and Iraqi lives lost massive financial cost to British economy.
Cameron - Regime change in Libya = Total uncontrollable anarchy.
                   Attempted regime change in Syria = Thousands of casualties, mass immigration into and destabilisation of Europe by non Syrian industrial migrants.
attributes.background: Most wars of recent times have been proliferated by politicians sending out false information to the public. If the politicians who voted for wars had to risk their own lives on the frontline, the wars would stop.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament do not have the power to make MPs who vote for war, fight on the front-line. It is an individual's decision whether to join the Armed Forces.
